publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1761 Mr Alex Salmond: Peterhead Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Peterhead Football Club on its successful run in the Scottish Cup, which culminated in the club reaching the quarter final for the first time in its history; notes that this achievement took place during the Blue Toon’s first season in senior football; believes that the team and its travelling fans are a credit to the local community, and wishes the team all the best for the remainder of this season and those to come.

S1M-1761 Mr Alex Salmond: Peterhead Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Peterhead Football Club on its successful run in the Scottish Cup, which culminated in the club reaching the quarter final for the first time in its history; notes that this achievement took place during the Blue Toon’s first season in senior football; believes that the team and its travelling fans are a credit to the local community, and wishes the team all the best for the remainder of this season and those to come.
S1M-1761 Peterhead Football Club (lodged on 15 March 2001) Michael Russell*, Andrew Wilson*
S1M-1761 Peterhead Football Club (lodged on 15 March 2001) Irene McGugan*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*

S1M-1761 Mr Alex Salmond: Peterhead Football Club—That the Parliament congratulates Peterhead Football Club on its successful run in the Scottish Cup, which culminated in the club reaching the quarter final for the first time in its history; notes that this achievement took place during the Blue Toon’s first season in senior football; believes that the team and its travelling fans are a credit to the local community, and wishes the team all the best for the remainder of this season and those to come. Supported by: Michael Russell, Andrew Wilson, Irene McGugan, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Fiona McLeod*
S1M-1761 Peterhead Football Club (lodged on 15 March 2001) Brian Adam*, Shona Robison*
S1M-1761 Peterhead Football Club (lodged on 15 March 2001) Alex Neil*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-1761 Peterhead Football Club (lodged on 15 March 2001) Richard Lochhead*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Tricia Marwick*
